Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Sidewinder
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: Just about any nomad you’d find roaming North America would vouch for the Quartz’s reliability and surprisingly solid performance in desert conditions. Unlike the vehicle itself, nomads toss the corporate branding to the side and instead refer to this Archer model as 'Sidewinder'. Of course, the name isn’t the only piece the wasteland-dwellers have chosen to modify. With swapped wheels, bumpers, and a performance-boosted engine, Sidewinders adeptly navigate off-road terrain and don’t go down easy.
